title: Use Logarithmic Models in Applications
body: Extended exposures to noice that measures $$85$$ dB (decibels) can cause permanent damage to the inner ear which will result in hearing loss. Use the formula: The loudness level, D, measured in decibels, of a sound of intensity, I, measured in watts per square inch is $$D=10*\log_{10}\left(\frac{I}{{10}^{\left(-12\right)}}\right)$$.
